output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio-billing): invoice schemas totals and numbering

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/invoice-service.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Added `schemas/invoice.ts` (Zod schemas/types), `services/invoiceService.ts` (in-memory invoice store + totals calculation + invoice numbering + list/detail/update primitives), and money conversion helpers in `lib/utils.ts`. Unit tests cover schema parsing, totals math, clinic/year numbering sequence, tenant scoping, duplicate appointment invoice prevention, and status/update rules.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Changed files: healio/schemas/invoice.ts, healio/services/invoiceService.ts, healio/lib/utils.ts, healio/tests/unit/invoice-service.test.ts, healio/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo.
`schemas/invoice.ts` includes list/create/update schemas plus invoice summary/detail response shapes and money/status/payment enums for follow-on API routes.

`services/invoiceService.ts` implements invoice totals calculation (line-item subtotal + tax amount/rate), clinic/year-scoped invoice numbering (`INV-YYYY-#####`), in-memory invoice persistence, tenant-scoped list/detail lookup, duplicate appointment invoice guard, and update/status transition validation.
`lib/utils.ts` now exports shared `moneyToCents` and `centsToMoney` helpers used for safe integer-based billing math.
Implementation commit: 0c161a8 (feat(healio-billing): invoice schemas totals and numbering).
